text: “I’m researching the C.E.O.s of these media conglomerates, and they’re predictably the mushiest white faces," Julio Torres said. "You see who is reaping the benefits of all the ‘woke’ content that me and my peers produce, and it’s just these kings.” https://t.co/EWkzLrsPN3
